name: 42apps-plugins
description: Collection of productivity plugins for Claude Code by 42apps

plugins.name: ralph-research
plugins.description: Deep codebase research and impact analysis before making changes. Iteratively explores code, maps all dependencies, identifies risks and critical points, and creates a comprehensive implementation plan.

plugins.name: nano-banana
plugins.description: AI image generation with Gemini 3 Pro. Smart prompts, style transfer, flexible API config (Google/OpenRouter).
